# titleRect(forBounds:)

**Instance Method**

Returns the rectangle into which the menu item’s title should be drawn.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor func titleRect(forBounds cellFrame: NSRect) -> NSRect
```

## Parameters

- **cellFrame**: A rectangle that defines the bounds of the receiver.

## Return Value

The returned rectangle is based on `cellFrame` but encompasses only the area to be occupied by the text of the title.

## Getting the Menu Item’s Drawing Rectangle

- **keyEquivalentRect(forBounds:)**: Returns the rectangle into which the menu item’s key equivalent should be drawn.
- **stateImageRect(forBounds:)**: Returns the rectangle into which the menu item’s state image should be drawn.
